categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Anvil Leader" was a male pilot that served in the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Following the Battle of Endor, he served as leader of Anvil Squadron, where he flew an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor in defending Mon Cala and the Battle of Galitan when New Republic forces were attacked by Titan Squadron.
"Anvil Leader" was a New Republic non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
